props.fullWidth: Forces the dialog to expand 100% of available width.
props.internalActivator: Detaches the menu content inside of the component as opposed to the document.
props.noClickAnimation: Disables the bounce effect when clicking outside of a `v-dialog`'s content when using the **persistent** prop.
props.openOnHover: Designates whether component should activate when its activator is hovered.
props.persistent: Clicking outside of the element will not deactivate it.
props.retainFocus: Tab focus will return to the first child of the dialog by default. Disable this when using external tools that require focus such as TinyMCE or vue-clipboard.
props.scrollable: When set to true, expects a `v-card` and a `v-card-text` component with a designated height. For more information, check out the [scrollable example](/components/dialogs#scrollable).

events.click:outside: Event that fires when clicking outside an active dialog.
events.keydown: Event that fires when key is pressed. If dialog is active and not using the **persistent** prop, the **esc** key will deactivate it.
